parameters: I've lived here alone for a long time ...
I have a lot of friends
···Yes. I wonder what will happen to us.
I have a lot of friends
really? How do you make it? teach···?
I live by eating the grass that grows from the window ...
Yes, please ... It's surprisingly delicious, isn't it?
I wonder when my dad and mom will come back ...
But I've lived alone so far, and maybe that's right ...
Talking to you like this makes things a little easier.
really? Is it worth it to me too?
Let's live together in this room ...
I don't really think that I don't like it ...
Uh ... I'll get rid of it, please ...
If you live here all the time alone, you won't know the time.
I've been waiting forever ... Dad and mom.
My body has grown a lot. But I'm not coming back ...
I wonder if it's no good anymore ... I wonder if there is no point in living ...
I'm sure my parents hated me and went out.
I wanted to be loved more. I wanted to be loved and happy.
I'm a little fine because you will come.
If you were there, you might not need anything anymore ...
It's painful, but let's live ... thanks to you.
I want to be with you more. Hey, more?
Don't be alone ... it's painful, I'm afraid of time.
I want you to promise that you will be with me forever. forever···.
Uh, yeah ... then come over here.
